name: One Day in London
description: Take active part in a nonlinear, interactive visual novel set against the atmospheric backdrop of the 19th century England.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Win 7 Processor: 2.33 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Win 7/Win 8 Processor: 2.33+ Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Better than Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant
